messages.title: Lib Dems Delivering for the Highlands
messages.content: £800 tax cut up to £1,200, Guaranteed pension rises, Cheaper fuel for our cars

messages.title: THE CRUCIAL QUESTION: Who can we trust to fight for NHS Highland?
messages.content: The SNP? Or The Lib Dems?

messages.title: Don't let the SNP get away with it...
messages.content: Only the Lib Dems can stop the SNP in the Highlands

messages.title: A record of action for the Highlands
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats have a long record of fighting for the Highlands.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: £800 tax cut for Highland workers in Government.
Guaranteed pension rises delivering the biggest pension increase ever.
The Lib Dems are saving motorists 20p per litre on fuel and securing a major fuel duty reduction in the most rural areas.
The Lib Dems propose £800 million extra for our Scottish NHS, more support for hard-pressed staff and prioritizing mental health treatment.

issues.economy: £800 tax cut for Highland workers in Government, guaranteed pension rises, cheaper fuel for our cars.
issues.health: NHS Highland funding issues and centralization by the SNP, £800 million extra for Scottish NHS, support for staff, mental health treatment prioritization.

politicalExperience.achievements: Long record of fighting for the Highlands, investment in rural broadband, discount stores to invest in the region, ferries discounts, saving 307 rural post offices, creating thousands of modern apprenticeships.
